title: Password reset for no reason
body:
So this just happened.
It's not just that I didn't request this.
I noticed this e-mail's format is different from what I would receive when I manually change my password
http://i.imgur.com/8plTNCH.png
, which means it's probably **not** someone else messing with my account, but Riot  itself decided to reset my password for some reason.
If that's the case, I need to know that reason so that it won't randomly happen again.

replies.body: Per the [emails from riot ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751784-Emails-from-Riot-Games)guide, the page seems legit despite the fancy formatting.  If you didn't request the change, then I highly suggest using our [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide to start locking down and securing your info.  Let me know if you run into any trouble accessing your account, and we can go from there.  This may also include changing your registered email if necessary.  This is a case of definitely wanting to be safer than sorry.

> [{quoted}](name=Porkoles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=IYQTX09y,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-01T21:45:19.142+0000)
>
> Per the [emails from riot ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751784-Emails-from-Riot-Games)guide, the page seems legit despite the fancy formatting.  If you didn't request the change, then I highly suggest using our [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide to start locking down and securing your info.  Let me know if you run into any trouble accessing your account, and we can go from there.  This may also include changing your registered email if necessary.  This is a case of definitely wanting to be safer than sorry.

It's more than just formatting.
The thing is I  got this **"temporary password"** instead of a link to the password-changing page.
I've never seen this feature of "reset password before changing it", I tried to look around and didn't find a possible way for me, or for any player, to "reset my password to a temporary password". 
Which is why I'm suspecting this isn't from someone who's trying to steal my account.


I'll do my part to secure my account, but still I need know under what circumstances will a "temporary password" be given?
**This is important to me because I've lost my access to some of the e-mails I used for my alt/smurf accounts years ago, if Riot randomly resets my other accounts' passwords I won't be able to retrieve them**

**Also if I didn't make myself clear, the second picture is unrelated to the first password-changing, I changed my password another time just to see how a normal password changing process will be like, and it's completely different from the first e-mail I received**
